title: The Hobbit, or There and Back Again...
subtitle: Interactive journey through Middle-earth with artificial intelligence
startGameHint: Your adventure will begin in the cozy hobbit-hole of Bag End...
confirmNewGame: Are you sure you want to start a new game? Current progress will be lost.

what.title: What is this game?
what.description1: You play as Bilbo Baggins on his incredible journey to the Lonely Mountain with the dwarves and the wizard Gandalf. AI acts like a game master, creating realistic responsive reactions to your actions.
what.description2: But remember: you cannot directly control Bilbo, you only set the direction of his thoughts, and how he behaves depends on his hobbit soul...

bilbo.title: How does Bilbo behave?

step1.title: Write intention
step1.description: Write what Bilbo wants to do, and Bilbo will try to do it...
step1.example: want to greet the guest ‚Üí Bilbo politely bows and says: ‚Äî Welcome to Bag End!

step2.title: World responds
step2.description: AI will describe the world's reaction, update the game state and continue the story:
step2.example: Gandalf smiles beneath his wide-brimmed hat and replies in a low voice...

will.title: Will system
will.description: Bilbo's will affects his behavior. Brave deeds strengthen will, cowardice weakens it.

time.title: Living time
time.description: Time flows realistically: conversations take minutes, journeys take days.

memory.title: World memory
memory.description: Characters remember your deeds, the world develops, and important events are preserved forever.

therapy.title: Therapy
therapy.description: The game is meditative and very fun!
